001package org.consensusj.jsonrpc.javanet;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.type.TypeReference;
005import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JavaType;
006import org.consensusj.jsonrpc.AbstractRpcClient;
007import org.consensusj.jsonrpc.JsonRpcError;
008import org.consensusj.jsonrpc.JsonRpcErrorException;
009import org.consensusj.jsonrpc.JsonRpcMessage;
010import org.consensusj.jsonrpc.JsonRpcRequest;
011import org.consensusj.jsonrpc.JsonRpcResponse;
012import org.consensusj.jsonrpc.JsonRpcStatusException;
013import org.slf4j.Logger;
014import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
015
016import java.io.IOException;
017import java.net.URI;
018import java.net.http.HttpClient;
019import java.net.http.HttpRequest;
020import java.net.http.HttpResponse;
021import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
022import java.time.Duration;
023import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
024import java.util.concurrent.CompletionException;
025import java.util.function.Function;
026
027/**
028 * Incubating JSON-RPC client using java.net.http.
029 * Synchronous API only for now (internal implementation is async), will add async API later.
030 */
031public class JsonRpcClientJavaNet extends AbstractRpcClient {
032    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(JsonRpcClientJavaNet.class);
033    private final URI serverURI;
034    private final String username;
035    private final String password;
036    private final HttpClient client;
037    private static final String UTF8 = StandardCharsets.UTF_8.name();
038
039
040    public JsonRpcClientJavaNet(JsonRpcMessage.Version jsonRpcVersion, URI server, final String rpcUser, final String rpcPassword) {
041        super(jsonRpcVersion);
042        log.debug("Constructing JSON-RPC client for: {}", server);
043        this.serverURI = server;
044        this.username = rpcUser;
045        this.password = rpcPassword;
046        this.client = HttpClient.newBuilder()
047                .connectTimeout(Duration.ofMinutes(2))
048                .build();
049    }
050
051    public JsonRpcClientJavaNet(URI server, final String rpcUser, final String rpcPassword) {
052        this(JsonRpcMessage.Version.V2, server, rpcUser, rpcPassword);
053    }
054
055    @Override
056    public <R> JsonRpcResponse<R> sendRequestForResponse(JsonRpcRequest request, JavaType responseType) throws IOException, JsonRpcStatusException {
057        //TypeReference<Map<Address, OmniwalletAddressBalance>> typeRef = new TypeReference<>() {};
058        HttpRequest httpRequest = buildJsonRpcPostRequest(request);
059        return (JsonRpcResponse<R>) sendForResponseAsync(httpRequest, responseType).join();
060
061    }
062
063    public String sendRequestForResponseString(JsonRpcRequest request) throws IOException, JsonRpcStatusException {
064        HttpRequest httpRequest = buildJsonRpcPostRequest(request);
065        return sendForStringAsync(httpRequest).join();
066
067    }
068
069    /**
070     * Get the URI of the server this client connects to
071     * @return Server URI
072     */
073    @Override
074    public URI getServerURI() {
075        return serverURI;
076    }
077
078    private String encodeJsonRpcRequest(JsonRpcRequest request) throws JsonProcessingException {
079        return mapper.writeValueAsString(request);
080    }
081
082    private <R> CompletableFuture<JsonRpcResponse<R>> sendForResponseAsync(HttpRequest request, JavaType responseType) {
083        log.debug("Send aysnc: {}", request);
084        return sendAsyncCommon(request)
085                .thenApply(mappingFunc(responseType));
086    }
087
088    private CompletableFuture<String> sendForStringAsync(HttpRequest request) {
089        log.debug("Send aysnc: {}", request);
090        return sendAsyncCommon(request);
091    }
092
093    private <R> CompletableFuture<R> sendAsync(HttpRequest request, Class<R> clazz) {
094        log.debug("Send aysnc: {}", request);
095        return sendAsyncCommon(request)
096                .thenApply(mappingFunc(clazz));
097    }
098
099    private <R> CompletableFuture<R> sendAsync(HttpRequest request, JavaType responseType) {
100        log.debug("Send aysnc: {}", request);
101        return sendAsyncCommon(request)
102                .thenApply(mappingFunc(responseType));
103    }
104
105    private <R> CompletableFuture<R> sendAsync(HttpRequest request, TypeReference<R> typeReference) {
106        log.debug("Send aysnc: {}", request);
107        return sendAsyncCommon(request)
108                .thenApply(mappingFunc(typeReference));
109    }
110
111    private CompletableFuture<String> sendAsyncCommon(HttpRequest request) {
112        log.debug("Send aysnc: {}", request);
113        return client.sendAsync(request, HttpResponse.BodyHandlers.ofString())
114                .whenComplete(JsonRpcClientJavaNet::log)
115                .thenComposeAsync(this::handleStatusError)
116                .thenApply(HttpResponse::body)
117                .whenComplete(JsonRpcClientJavaNet::log);
118    }
119
120    private CompletableFuture<HttpResponse<String>> handleStatusError(HttpResponse<String> response) {
121        if (response.statusCode() != 200) {
122            String errorResponse = response.body();
123            log.error("Bad status code: {}: {}", response.statusCode(), errorResponse);
124            return CompletableFuture.failedFuture(new JsonRpcStatusException(errorResponse, response.statusCode(), errorResponse, -1, errorResponse, null));
125
126        } else {
127            return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(response);
128        }
129    }
130
131    private HttpRequest buildJsonRpcPostRequest(JsonRpcRequest request) throws JsonProcessingException {
132        String requestString = encodeJsonRpcRequest(request);
133        return buildJsonRpcPostRequest(requestString);
134    }
135
136    private HttpRequest buildJsonRpcPostRequest(String requestString) throws JsonProcessingException {
137        log.info("request is: {}", requestString);
138
139        String auth = username + ":" + password;
140        String basicAuth = "Basic " + base64Encode(auth);
141
142        return HttpRequest
143                .newBuilder(serverURI.resolve(""))
144                .header("Content-Type", "application/json;charset=" +  UTF8)
145                .header("Accept-Charset", UTF8)
146                .header("Accept", "application/json")
147                .header ("Authorization", basicAuth)
148                .POST(HttpRequest.BodyPublishers.ofString(requestString))
149                .build();
150    }
151
152
153    private <R> MappingFunction<R> mappingFunc(Class<R> clazz) {
154        return s -> mapper.readValue(s, clazz);
155    }
156
157    private <R> MappingFunction<R> mappingFunc(JavaType responseType) {
158        return s -> mapper.readValue(s, responseType);
159    }
160
161    private <R> MappingFunction<R> mappingFunc(TypeReference<R> typeReference) {
162        return s -> mapper.readValue(s, typeReference);
163    }
164
165    @FunctionalInterface
166    interface MappingFunction<R> extends ThrowingFunction<String, R> {}
167
168    @FunctionalInterface
169    interface ThrowingFunction<T,R> extends Function<T, R> {
170
171        /**
172         * Gets a result wrapping checked Exceptions with {@link RuntimeException}
173         * @return a result
174         */
175        @Override
176        default R apply(T t) {
177            try {
178                return applyThrows(t);
179            } catch (final Exception e) {
180                throw new CompletionException(e);
181            }
182        }
183
184        /**
185         * Gets a result.
186         *
187         * @return a result
188         * @throws Exception Any checked Exception
189         */
190        R applyThrows(T t) throws Exception;
191    }
192    
193    private static void log(HttpResponse<String> httpResponse, Throwable t) {
194        if ((httpResponse != null)) {
195            log.info("log data string: {}", httpResponse);
196        } else {
197            log.error("exception: ", t);
198        }
199    }
200
201    private static void log(String s, Throwable t) {
202        if ((s != null)) {
203            log.info("log data string: {}", s.substring(0 ,Math.min(100, s.length())));
204        } else {
205            log.error("exception: ", t);
206        }
207    }
208}
